values:
continuous forward motion is draining
am i doing the right thing
running forward on a treadmill going backwards
pushing in the wrong direction
or learning from self-doubting again

~ Yes, they're sharing a drink they call loneliness
But it's better than drinkin' alone ~ Billy Joel

So I was hired today by Majic 100 to do one overnight shift per week.
Right now, trying to listen to Bob FM for my report due MONDAY -- ahh.
In the near future: moving to Orleans! July-August-ish. We have three months to fix the condo up before we move in.

So things are pretty much the same..... 

- still doing okay in school
- did a psa for MADD that i like... thinking of sending it to them
- interviewed Anti-Flag on Thursday night -- fun, and a good interview.

Alright. So a few things going on.

My show for this semester is: Wednesdays from 12-noon to 1pm on CKDJ 107.9 or www.ckdj.net

My newscast is on Mondays at 10am

My parents have lent me their car. Probably for the whole semester.

Apparently the Team 1200 wont have any more work for me until .... summer? Easter? 

I desperately need something exciting and unschool/radio related to keep me going for the next few months. I need some sort of distraction.

I got my grades back a little while ago. 3.82 GPA.

I've felt restless lately.

" Am I awake?

What time is it?

When I get through this day 
Can someone tell me how 
And how much longer now
Am I awake?

The coffee's cold, did I forget to drink it yet
Did I forget?
My clothes are wet I don't remember drinking it

When I get through this part
Will the next one be the same 
Will I be wondering
If I'm awake?

These are not the clothes I had on when I went to bed
And something else besides my hair is growing from my head
And when I close my eyes it looks the same as when I open them again

Am I awake?

What time is it?

Is it that time again?
Wasn't it already then?
So does it have to be
The time it was again

When I get through this day
Can't someone tell me how
And how much longer now
Am I awake? 
Am I awake?

When I get through this day 
Can someone tell me how 
And how much longer now
Am I awake?

When I get through this day 
Can someone tell me how 
And how much longer now
Am I awake? " They might be giants

i put my earphones on 'cause i'm always afraid, the music shields me from the people i can't push away, eyes dark like coal, fire burning beneath, wish i could reach out and pull back yesterday but it's too late

I'm really bummed about not being able to find any of the d.b.s. album's I lost/don't have .... i only have the i is for insignificance and north america sucks albums left... i've been waiting about a year for forget everything you know to be re-pressed.. and haven't even seen anything of any other one.

I haven't posted in a long-time... some things have happened over the last few months.

- We got in a car accident -- everyone is okay but the car was....garbage.
- I moved into my new apartment
- Jon moved in with me (which has turned out really well)
- Got a huge surprise scholarship
- Started the Radio Program, have my own weekly show
- Got to interview Against Me! for the punk show
- Struggling with finals
- My babe is almost 3 now -- she's amazing.

indiscreet gluttony
drill wells and
rape the land
in a 
cyle of production, consuption, and demand
it's just one step in a masterplan
of world domination and then division
All belongs to the state
Not the people from whence it came
An army is a weapon of mass destruction.

I'm looking for some stuff:

dresser for haleigh
dresser for me
night tables?
air conditioner (ha ha)
tv stand
coffee table?
whatever whatever
I got an apartment. I move in August 1st. It's a two bedroom... there's a playground and a pool. It's near my friends and family and well... things are looking good today :D

I'm all out of moves... I don't know what to do next... Tonight and tomorrow I need to focus on a new plan because there's only so much time left before I need to be out of here and so far nobody seems to want to rent to a 19y/o student with her 2.5 y/o daughter... People are so ignorant sometimes... still very ill...

~ i sleep until there is no light
i'm wide awake all through the night
dinner may suck, but i take a bite
i do whatever i can
my muscles stiffen through the day
discomfort never goes away
someone should throw me away, i feel like... garbage ~ afi

i eat like two bites and i feel like i've eaten 3 meals... so weird.

well what can i say? I waited for two whole days and nothing... patience is a virtue, one that I can strive to but will likely never achieve... so when I go to bed tonight... whenever that is... I'm going to let myself stop waiting.

~ i don't know what i want, but i can't wait forever, it isn't difficult at all.. it makes no sense to me ~

tomorrow i'll stop waiting.... i need one more night to make sure.

could someone please pull the knives out of my throat?
get the knots out of my neck?
bring my fever down?
give me a little concentration back?
help me fall asleep?
or else give me some energy?

thanks.

much appreciated.

trying so hard to make this into something lighter than it is... 

i wonder if i had any impact on his life...
or, the minute he quit talking to me
did he bic his head a-la-nazi
did he smoke a spliff and down
two big mac's for munchies
and then go home and talk-talk to her
i don't know man, what do you think?

i went to see that apartment... the one he showed me was SO not two levels with a patio!! This means, they just hiked the rent. Crossing my fingers for this one cause the neighbourhood seems very child-friendly... there were lots of children there and a park... fairly quiet.

why am i still waiting? *MEH*

~ i'm bored today, and everything's there to be ignored today, scattered everywhere out on the floor today, and i don't care about you... maybe it wasn't bad to do, you did what you had to do, maybe i'll believe it too, if i keep saying i don't care about you today, i don't know what i'm gonna do today, and there's a lot to get through today but i don't care about you. today. ~

i went to the doctor today, and i'm going to see that apartment today, and ~ everything will be real alright, alright? ~... inaction says so much. but at least now i know. stop waiting... just go go go..... obviously i care very much but this is the beginning of forming a habit. 7 more days.

its like chipping a tooth and breathing in cold air just to feel it... i want to see him just to let it sting... me of course.. not him... i'm going to bed soon. i have to stop obsessing. maybe i can write today off as my obsessing day and tomorrow can be all ~shiny and new~.... this livejournal posting has got to stop too...

this is the worst pain i have felt in about 2.5 years... it's crazy... i was expecting a sore throat but that never really came.. instead every one of my glands in my neck (front, back, sides.. ahhh), shoulders, and behind my ears has swollen up so much that it has left my neck/shoulders completely stiff and increadibly sore... i can't sleep because there is no position that I can lie in without feeling like my neck is going to explode... i keep picture my head flying off my shoulders.... i want sleep.

of course danny had to be in North Bay this week... yep the entire week.... go figure.

~ if the music's loud enough i get the courage to say fuck you.. when i'm on my own again, you've left me totally screwed... if the music's loud enough it puts everything into perspective ~ d.b.s.

so i'm still hanging onto anger here as the lyrics would suggest but it's fabricated anger... it doesn't really exist i'm just pulling it out of nowhere to make the day go by easier. how many days does it take again to make a habit? I think they say it's 8... maybe 8 days until it becomes a habit not to care again.... ~ try not to try, try not to care, it's really easy once you learn that no one is listening ~

it would be easier i think if i wasn't so bored.. but i don't have anything to do.. home sick with mono which is getting worse and worse...

I have an appointment to see an apartment tomorrow... rent was supposed to be $879 but they don't have any of those units left so the next up was $929 which we got down to $899... so now to go see it tomorrow at 4:30 and do the application thing.... *cross my fingers*.. I'm not even excited... the floor plan seems nice though... two bedrooms, two levels, and a patio.

There's this one Face to Face album that I always like to belt out when I'm feeling this way.... it's the Big Choice album... it's funny because the first time I went through the lyrics I thought they were done so poorly... I remember thinking about how horrible they were...

"you think that i'm invincible
it's going to pull me down
you think that i'm invisible 
it's going to pull me down
to somwhere i don't want to go
it's okay

you think i'm indestructible
it's going to pull me down
you think that i'm a miracle
it's going to pull me down
to somwhere i don't want to go
it's okay

i don't know what you want  from me
but it's probably already gone
i don't care what you think of me
your opinion means nothing at all

don't say i'm okay
don't say i'm okay
don't say i'm okay
i'm not okay"

"Big lies
Surprise
you've thought of everything
it builds your character you know
no way
okay
so what's the price you pay?
too late to realize you're broke...

But this was all your choice
do you think it makes a difference now?
This was all your choice
It's good to see it hasn't changed you

You've tried 
Denied
Can't win at everything
It's building Character you know
Don't wait
Too late"

And last night he was kind of like...

"You think you're all over with it
Don't want to talk about it
I'll tell you something
you don't want to know

So what's the problem with my life?
Don't overcomplicate it
Let's stop with all this wasting time
I feel you all around
There's nothing else that I can see
Anything is better than nothing

I'll try and try
I wont be denied
I want my chance
I want what's mine"

But i was like
"tell me something 
that i don't already know
tell me how you plan to save the world...

I know that you might never understand
the way i feel
I made a promise to myself
that I would never let it show

Never look down
Never look down
Just keep my focus straight ahead
And try to walk this line..."

and then trying to keep myself mad...

"it's all the same inside our minds
everything is justified
what is wrong and what is right
everything is justified"

That was probably the worst part... Just the humiliation and stupidity of it all you know... I wanted to get so mad... I wanted to yell and scream and swear but I found that I just couldn't.... I cared too much to be mad.. if that makes sense.. normally me being mad is just to cover up my hurt anyway... Still feels like everything that has happened in the last three months was a lie.
edited this out... those who know me well enough already know what happened.

feeling pretty stupid today
wishing i'd never looked your way
you can throw bricks by my head, but they're still going straight over
i'm blind and naive a victim of my own stupidity
trusting in something i never knew to begin with

... i'm sick ... on top of the strep throat i knew i had, i have now discovered i have mono... why doesn't someone just hit me with a mack truck and get it over with? Actually.. that happened to me when I was a baby.. yes a mack truck rear-ended us and I was in the carseat in the back..... i'm like the roadrunner or something cause i just keep going... actually maybe more like the coyote cause i keep getting hit and i keep bouncing back... you wait and see .... hey mono, c'mere, i'm gonna kick you.... ahhh....
Some good news... my drum is being fixed :) Yes, right now it's at the drum-doctor having a new skin put on it. No more ironing near the drum.

so the early hours of the day were like this:
i'm having a ba(aa)d da(a)y
and if eveyone'd fuck off it'd be okay
so fuck off fuck off fuck off fuck off fuck off fuck off fuck off
and ever-y-thing will be okay
okay?
okay.

but then i went to jon's house and watched a movie and it was like some cheesy movie cause everything was all of a sudden okay and it was like ~ 'cause the sun always shines around you ~ LOL :)whatever whatever.

Posting in huge spurts here but... this week has really brought me through a range of emotions.. the school stuff, apartment stuff...dealing with so many things right now.. hard to keep my head up sometimes.

major thanks to danny b for being here for me through all this confusing, challenging, tiring, and just plain insane stuff... thanks for lending an ear, and thanks for helping me out... this one's for you kid, cause it sounds like something(S) you've said to me before... and i've also got to keep reminding myself ....

"Come Out Fighting"

Originally recorded by Pennywise,
dedicated to the memory of JasonMatthew Thirsk

Voices! You're letting voices tell you what to do
when you yourself don't know.
Voices! You got one too, so let it out
and let us know when you're feeling all alone.

Well I know,
There are times when- you're feeling close to the ground
And there's times when- you may feel there's no place to call home
And there's times when- your best friend just seems so far away
And there's times when- the only end in sight is the end

You've got to come out fighting! Come out fighting! Come out fighting!
Don't let it get you down.

Problems! I've got em too but keeping them inside is not the thing to do.
Problems! You've got to face hang-ups head-on, before you know they're hangin' you.

You've got to come out fighting! Come out fighting! Come out fighting!

All alone yes all alone. Loneliness, it is something we all know.
Woooh all alone, yes all alone. Been there before so please believe me
'cause I know.

You've got to come out fighting! Come out fighting! Come out fighting!
Come out fighting!

well i wrote this about my drum in grade 12 english class i think..

DJEMBE

Dancing to the sound of a beating drum
My eyes closed; blind to all but the sound
Limbs fill with rhythm; my mind going numb
My heart keeping time with the soothing pound
Like medicine, the drum eases my pain
Massages my muscles; my great masseur 
Breath; directing oxygen to my brain
Bass be my therapy, drum be my cure
Drum take me high; away to my safe place
Drum take me home; I long for your embrace
please take a moment of silence for my djembe today. it died this morning when an iron fell and broke right through its head.. no burns, but the hole itself was enough to kill it. i feel sick.

i got into the radio broadcasting program.... 1 down 1 to go... just need an appartment... i applied for one (westboro area).. should know this week.

~ come out fighting ~

Dear Haleigh:

" I hope you never lose your sense of wonder, 
You get your fill to eat 
But always keep that hunger, 
May you never take a single breath for granted, 
God forbid love ever leave you empty handed, 
I hope you still feel small 
When you stand beside the ocean, 
Whenever one door closes I hope one more opens, 
Promise me, that you'll give faith a fighting chance 
 And when you get the choice to sit it out or dance 

I hope you dance . I hope you dance 

I hope you never fear those mountains 
in the distance, 
Never settle for the path of least resistance, 
Living might mean taking chances 
But they are worth taking, 
Loving might be a mistake 
But it's worth making, 
Don't let some hell bent heart leave you bitter 
When you come close to selling out 
Reconsider, 
Give the heavens above more 
Than just a passing glance, 
And when you get the choice to sit it out or dance 

I hope you dance . I hope you dance 

I hope you still feel small 
When you stand beside the ocean, 
Whenever one door closes I hope one more opens, 
Promise me you'll give faith a fighting chance, 
And when you get the choice to sit it out or dance 

I hope you dance . I hope you dance " L.W.
~ ... i can't talk to you. i'm shallow, i'm inhibited, i'm looking for a hole to fall into... you can't see through what i don't want to show you... ~ Greg MacPherson

i pretty much suck at being a girlfriend
never know what to do or say
least it seems to be this way
i screw up every day
it's a wonder that he likes me around
ya ya
its a wonder that he likes me around

"I'm So Bored With the U.S.A." ~ The Clash

Yankee soldier
He wanna shoot some skag
He met it in Cambodia
But now he can't afford a bag

Yankee dollar talk
To the dictators of the world
In fact it's giving orders
An' they can't afford to miss a word

I'm so bored with the U...S...A...
But what can I do?

Yankee detectives
Are always on the TV
'Cos killers in America
Work seven days a week

Never mind the stars and stripes
Let's print the Watergate Tapes
I'll salute the New Wave
And I hope nobody escapes

I'm so bored with the U...S...A...
But what can I do?

Move up Starsky
For the C.I.A.
Suck on Kojak
For the USA

just a couple of things that really don't make sense...

first -- it does not make sense to vandalize a daycare playground. it's worse than stealing candy from a baby. it's senseless and mean and it's really hard to explain to children why some strangers came and spilled over their garden and broke the branches off their trees. 

second -- i can fully appreciate contructive criticism but don't tell me how to do my job just for the sake of telling me how to do my job and then go and ask me to do yours. it doesn't make sense and i don't like it.

still waiting on algonquin... ~ born to do dishes ~ ????
~ shut the hell up, i don't wanna hear a word ~ SW

Danny sent these lyrics to me this afternoon... he could have written this for me because it's like everything he and i have said before simplified... we can always find songs to speak to each other it seems.

Kick It 
by the Vandals

I don't need much attention anymore
Sometimes I cringe at the thought of the things that I did before
And I don't wanna take up all your time
Sometimes I cringe at the thought of being left behind
She said "You're not the boss of me"
And I don't wanna be
Just some guy trying to be something that I'm not

CHORUS
Do you wanna kick it, wit me?
I wanna kick it with you
Do you wanna kick it, wit me?
I wanna kick it with you

Everyone has something for you now
And I know, well I hope that I one be one of the crowd
If you feel that I am out of line
Well I hope that you don't, but I won't wait in line
I have learned not to offer much advice
Who am I? Just a guy, like I know how to run your life
Well I guess I'll tell you who I am
I'm a man with a plan make you say goddamn
She said "You're not the boss of me"
And I don't wanna be
Just some guy trying to be something that I'm not

CHORUS (2x)
And everybody's got something new to offer you
And all the wonderful things that they can do
I keep it simple- I just wanna kick it wit you
~ she's cooking salad for breakfast. she's got tofu the size of texas. ~ Beck

SOUND SYSTEM ~ OP IVY


Sound system gonna bring me back up
One thing that I can depend on
Try to describe to the limit of my ability:
Its there for a second
Then it's given up what it used to be
Contained in my music somehow more than just sound
This inspiration coming and twisting things around
Because you always know that its gonna have to go
You always know that you'll be back in the cold.
Point of departure sublimated in a song
Its always coming to give me that hope for just a second
Then its gone but!
Static pulse inside of music bringing us escape
Its always temporary changing nothing in its wake
Just a second where were leaving all this shit behind
Just a second but its leaving just this much in mind:
To resist despair that second makes you see
To resist despair because you cant change everything
To resist despair in this world is what it is to be free
Wake up turn my box on
Bust the shade let the sun in
times getting tougher bout time to start runnin
Box in my hand music by my side
Skanking to the rhythm of the music by my side

Speakers Push The Air ~ Pretty Girls Make Graves
Do you remember when
We couldn't put it away?
Do you remember when
We couldn't put it away?
Do you remember what the music meant?
(To you?) (To me?) (To you?) (To me?)
Do you remember what the music meant?
Life's complications and frustrations
They disappear when the music starts playing
I found a place where it feels alright
I heard a record and it opened my eyes
Do you remember when we couldn't put it away?
Do you remember what the music meant?
And nothing else matters
When I turn it up loud
There was the one definitive moment
Well, did it mean it to you?
There was that one definitive moment
When it was something new
Life's complications and frustrations
They disappear when the music starts playing
I found a place where it feels alright
I heard a record and it opened my eyes
Did it mean it to you?
Do you remember when
We couldn't put away?
Do you remember when
We couldn't put it away?
Do you remember what the music meant?
And nothing else matters
Yeah nothing else matters
When I turn it up loud
Yeah nothing else matters
When I turn it up loud

That Song  ~ Bouncing Souls           
             
I put that record on just to make a sound The rhythm hit get my movement off the ground The soundtrack of what i want to be If i want to change the world, it's gotta start with me. I put the needle on the record and play that song again
And in the end what have we learned?
Are we just faces in the crowd?
I died and was reborn again today
Hold fast to myself, make these good feelings stay We laughed we cried
The music shaped our lives so tell me why our movement's out of time? Are we so out of line? 
I put the needle on the record and play that song again
A movement with no leaders
We stand tonight hearts in our hands

apparently "i'm out" is the equivalent to "we're breaking up"... yikes, ouch, that stings, my fault and i'm sorry. 

You're the Only One - MTX

You're the only one for me I tell you three or four times a day. When you're with me I'm happy. I'm lost and lonely when you're away. Every night I have to spend without you my suffering grows ever more and more. I wouldn't suffer like this for just anyone-- you're the only one I want to suffer for. You're the only one. Now we've established something precious, but chances are it could go awry when we find how weak the flesh is, shattered, scattered, hung out to dry. It'll all come out when it's dicovered, clearer than the teardrop in my eye, but I don't want to get screwed over by just anyone-- you're the only one I want to get screwed over by. You're the only one. My heart is a mess yes it's true. I've tried to fix it up just for you. It's not done yet but it will have to do. Oo woo oo oo. I know there are so many others out there who might like a chance to get a crack at it too, but if my heart's gonna get broken anyway I'd rather have it get broken by you. You're the only one...

thought of this on the bus to my broadcasting test ~ didn't do so well so i guess it wasn't true LOL

someone told me through lyrics borrowed from a queers song
that i was born to do dishes but oh he was wrong
there was just one thing that he didn't know
he couldn't tell but i was born to be on the radio

sometimes i wonder if 
three quarters of our relationship
exists only in your head
i feel left out
(i'll toss a penny on my way out)

hypocrisy. an expression of agreement 
that is not supported by conviction.
just something you said say to smooth
things over one more day
childishness. marked by or indicating
lack of maturity; you play the game you're playing
without informing of the rules
assumption. something taken for granted
or accepted as truth without proof, kind of like
what's happening with you.
manipulation. shrewd or devious management 
for one's own advantage but sometimes pushing others 
away -- like it would be in this case.

sometimes i wonder if
three quarters of our relationship
exists only in your head
i feel left out
(i'll toss a penny on my way out)
too simple to be an issue
so whats the point of this game anyway
i didn't opt in but 
i'll say i'm out
